a.detail: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor
a.summary: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor

c.detail: Someone has scrawled "Sharpen thy spear and ready thy shield" here
c.summary: Someone has scrawled "Sharpen thy spear and ready thy shield" here

e.detail: The walls here have been engraved with endless spirals
e.summary: The walls here have been engraved with endless spirals

i.detail: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here
i.summary: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here

m.detail: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

r.detail: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by a neutral good ranger as a planar gate. It became cursed by the gods, and has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

monster: Cult Fanatic (cr 2, mm 345) and 1 x Cultist (cr 1/8, mm 345); deadly, 475 xp

Treasure: 2400 cp, 1200 sp, 110 gp, a fine steel ring set with a single alexandrite (25 gp), a portrait (of a female halfling) in a wooden frame engraved with a labyrinth (25 gp), a wooden coffer inlaid with a filigree of silver (25 gp), 2 x Potion of Healing (common, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: A tapestry of arcane patterns hangs from the east wall, and an iron sarcophagus sits in the center of the room

settings.name: The Forsaken Tomb of Gothmog of Udun

wandering_monsters.1: Cult Fanatic (cr 2, mm 345) and 1 x Cultist (cr 1/8, mm 345); deadly, 475 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.2: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.3: Goblin Boss (cr 1, mm 166) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.4: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.5: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.6: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
